block.p: NBA -- Fined John Starks, New York Knicks guard, $5,000 for a flagrant foul in a game on May 14. Fined Phil Jackson, Chicago Bulls coach, $2,500 for comments on officiating following a game on May 10.
LOS ANGELES LAKEERS -- Extended the contract of Jerry West, general manager. Continental Basketball Association
ROCKFORD LIGHTNING -- Named Mike Bonczyk director of operations-marketing, and Pat Campbell director of tickets-merchandising. Football Canadian Football League
TORONTO ARGONAUTS -- Signed David Giacomazzo, guard, and Hugh Lawson and Chris Hughes, defensive lineman. Hockey International Hockey League
PEORIA RIVERMEN -- Named Nicki Lopez account executive. College
IDAHO -- Promoted Dawn Colston, women's interim assistant volleyball coach, to women's full-time assitant volleyball coach.
NORTHERN IOWA -- Named Christopher Ritrievi athletic director.
